productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: EltaMD UV Clear is an oil free sunscreen with Zinc Oxide that blends in effortlessly and leaves no white cast, Helps protect against breakouts and is an essential acne sunscreen for those with acne prone skin care concerns, This travel size sunscreen pump bottle is the perfect companion for bringing on the go as your daily face sunscreen, Face sunscreen for sensitive skin helps soothe sensitive skin types prone to acne, rosacea, and hyperpigmentation, This facial sunscreen can easily be worn alone or under makeup and is an ideal face sunscreen for oily skin See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Sunscreen for My Mature, Acne Prone Skin
reviews.reviewText: As a woman past 40 with acne and sensitive skin, I'm constantly searching for sunscreen that doesn't make me break out or irritate. A couple of years ago, while in the tropics during winter, everyone thought I had a bad sunburn, but no, it was hives all over my chest, neck, and face. I looked like a swollen lobster, which is not a good look when you are actually eating lobster.I've tried every brand I can find in all different price ranges. Inevitably, I toss the ones that make me break out in hives or are super irritating, and most of the remaining clog my pores or otherwise encourage facial acne, so they end up in a bag for the rest of my family to use. The last time I was at a beach, I just hauled out my failed pricey facial sunscreens, slathered them all over my legs, and wore a gigantic hat.Then my blue-eyed red-headed niece (extremely sensitive to the sun) told me about Elta MD UV Clear Face Sunscreen. Her dermatologist had recommended it because of her acne issues. I was a bit skeptical because I'd been prescribed all kinds of treatments by my dermatologist, and none of them worked very well, but I've been using the Elta MD all this summer and couldn't be more pleased with the results. I still wear a hat because we all know no sunscreen protects 100%, but most importantly, my skin has actually gotten clearer.It's expensive but worth it if, like me, every other sunscreen makes you break out in rash or pimples. As you can see in the pictures, a small amount goes a long way and is completely sheer with no residue. One pump from the applicator is exactly enough for the face and neck. Because of the price, I use it only on my face, so my small bottle of Elta MD has lasted for about two months.It's not super moisturizing, but if I apply my moisturizer first and give it time to settle, I can benefit from both. Another great advantage of this lotion is that it can be reapplied without residue building up. I've used products that get gross after a couple of layers, but this really is very sheer and seems to absorb completely into the skin.There is no added fragrance, so you don't have to worry about weird odors, and Elta MD also makes a tinted sunscreen that I sometimes wear over the UV clear so I can even out my skin tone AND discourage acne. All around, the best sunscreen I've ever used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: EltaMD UV Clear Face Sunscreen is hands down the best sunscreen I’ve ever used! The lightweight formula feels like silk on my skin, and it absorbs quickly without any greasy residue. It’s a game-changer for my sensitive skin – no irritation or breakouts. The broad-spectrum SPF 46 provides excellent sun protection, and the added niacinamide has visibly improved my skin’s texture and tone. I love that it works well under makeup, creating a smooth base without causing any pilling. The pump dispenser is not only convenient but also ensures minimal product wastage. This sunscreen has become a daily essential for me, and I can’t recommend it enough for anyone in search of a reliable, dermatologist-recommended sun protection solution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best sunscreen for the face. Will not cause breakouts.
reviews.reviewText: I love the texture of this sunscreen. Feels more like skincare. Never oily. It does not cause breakouts and makeup goes on beautifully over it. I use it under my eyes as well and it does not irritate. I have combination skin with a very oily t zone. Worth the prize.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I didn't want to like it (but I do)
reviews.reviewText: I didn't want to like this product, because it's expensive. But I concede that it's amazing. It's light and absorbs easily into the face. It's not greasy. No weird white cast. My sensitive skin hates 99% of the sunscreens I have tried, but I've had no issues with this one. It layers nicely on top of my usual moisturizer, and isn't a total nightmare with makeup as long as you allow it to fully absorb and you didn't go too hard on the initial application.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All I can say is FINALLY!!!
reviews.reviewText: Despite knowing its importance, I have avoided wearing facial sunscreen my entire adulthood because I haven’t been able to find one that doesn’t make me break out, one that doesn’t make my skin oily, one that doesn’t make my skin dry, one that doesn’t pill under my makeup, etc etc etc. This sunscreen is AMAZING. Finally I have found a product that I am excited to use as a part of my daily routine. This sunscreen is silky smooth, light, moisturizing… doesn’t make my sensitive skin break out, doesn’t have a strong odor… it is simply fantastic and worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost my favorite sunscreen
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin and have a hard time finding a good sunscreen that looks good and feels good on my face. This one causes absolutely no irritation, and leaves a beautiful glow on my face! But it does peel a bit after a while which was such a bummer, because I love to add layers of moisture to my skin, now I can only add one light moisturizer before applying sunscreen and even then it peels a little.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my husband and I to use on a trip to Australia. It was extremely effective and it did not burn our eyes which has happened with other sunscreens when we perspire. It was smooth and easy to get it on evenly. I felt like I was wearing a moisturizer + really good sunscreen. I have some rosacea and it did not cause any kind of reaction.
Se siente muy bien deja la piel suave sin ser aceitoso
Very light and not oily at all
I love the silky smooth texture of this sunblock & I find it effective, especially in sunny Singapore. Plus, the seller was super fast in delivery. Thank you so much!

reviews.reviewTitle: Might just be the SPF of my dreams
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensi skin so there aren't many spfs that work well for my skin. I break out easily, and some spfs just don't give me that feel good skin.... I just got this and used it once so far, didn't leave any white cast, blends into skin easily, a little goes a long way, skin didn't feel sticky at all, no skin irritations/breakouts and overall its supposedly really good for your skin - anti-aging benefits and general sun protection....I will update in a few weeks or months after I confirm that it is indeed the new spf for me. Mind you, im switching from being a long-time user of Neutrugena Spf50 clear skin (since 2013/14) also for the past few weeks I started using La Roche Posay and that also didn't cause breakouts but just something about it doesnt feel good... and just in one day, EltaMD feels much better when applied. It came packaged very securely - in a box, with instructions taped onto the bottle - which was further secured with a plastic covering!!!
